summary: A test suite that validates the behavior and robustness of the NLLB mixture‑of‑experts model, covering configuration integrity, encoder‑decoder operation, large‑input handling, half‑precision generation, loss calculation, input embedding handling, and strict save/load functionality.
business_intent: Guarantee that the multilingual NLLB MoE model works correctly in production environments by detecting regressions and ensuring compatibility with various data sizes and precision settings.
